#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {



RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                const uint64_t& arg1,
                                const uint64_t& arg2,
                                const uint64_t& arg3,
                                const uint64_t& arg4,
                                uint64_t* arg5,
                                bool_t* arg6
                                ) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [arg5, arg6, ev](Future* fu) {
            /* This is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
            uint64_t ret1;
            bool_t vote_granted;
            /* Retrieve RPC return values in order */
            fu->get_reply() >> ret1;
            fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
            /* Process the RPC response here */
            *arg5 = ret1;
            *arg6 = vote_granted;
            ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, arg1, arg2, arg3, arg4, fuattr);
    }
  }
    return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  const uint64_t& arg1) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [ev](Future* fu) {
        // fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
        ev->Set(1);

      };
      
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
       Call_Async(proxy, AppendEmptyEntries, arg1, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,


                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  const uint64_t &leaderTerm, const uint64_t &leaderId, const uint64_t &prevLogIndex, const uint64_t &prevLogTerm, const vector<shared_ptr<Marshallable>> cmdLogEntries, const vector<uint64_t> &termLogEntries, const uint64_t &leaderCommit, uint64_t *term, bool_t *success) {


  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [term,success,ev](Future* fu) {
        uint64_t termRes;
        bool_t successRes;
        fu->get_reply() >> termRes;
        fu->get_reply() >> successRes;
        *term = termRes;
        *success = successRes;
 
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      std::vector<MarshallDeputy> md;
      md.reserve(cmdLogEntries.size());

      for(const auto& cmdLogEntry : cmdLogEntries) {
        
          md.emplace_back(cmdLogEntry); 
      }
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
       Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, leaderTerm, leaderId,prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, md, termLogEntries, leaderCommit, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
